sentences: K端sijaid oli palju, k端simusi veelgi rohkem.
Matkati metsas, kuid veelgi meelsamini soos.
Uus seadus tugevdas veelgi eraomanike positsioone.
context: The Estonian word 'veelgi' is an adverb that typically appears before comparative forms to emphasize and strengthen them. It can mean 'even more', 'still', 'further', or 'additionally'. This adverb intensifies the meaning of the adjective or adverb it modifies, indicating a greater degree or extent than what has already been mentioned.
